pages.text: Potions are divided into tiers. More powerful potion effects are more complex to brew, with a few exceptions. Every tier has a base potion, each of which is more complex to brew than the last. Each base potion uses the previous tier's base potion as a base, with the exception of tier 0, which uses water bottles.

Tier 0 potions are brewed with plain water, tier 1 are brewed with thick potions, created using rotten flesh. Tier 2 potions come from mundane potions, brewed using beetroot. Tier 3 potions use awkward potions as a base, brewed using nether wart.
